title: Amazing Animal Art Projects (gnv64)
description:
Amazing Animal Art Projects - 20 Easy Step-by-Step Paper Projects That Connect to Seasonal and Science Topics
by Jo Lynn Alcorn
Scholastic Teaching Resources | January 2008 | ISBN-10: 0439517869 | PDF | 80 pages | 19.1 mb

Enhance science studies throughout the year with 20 eye-catching paper projects! These colorful 3-D critters connect to seasonal themes and help students learn important science content about animal behavior, features, and habitats. Students will love creating bat hats, alligator puppets, waddling penguins, and more! Includes writing connections to extend learning. For use with Grades 1Ã¢â‚¬â€œ3.
